formalpara.title: Movie 5. Dual fluorescent and DIC microscopy of embryo carrying GFP::PIE-1 from the one-cell stage until the four-cell stage.
formalpara.para: GFP::PIE-1 is pseudocolored in blue. One image was captured every ten seconds, and the movie is played back at 10 frames per second. Courtesy of the Gönczy laboratory.
